com.gembox.spreadsheet.conditionalformatting

Class DataBarCondition

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gembox.spreadsheet.conditionalformatting.FormatCondition
      • com.gembox.spreadsheet.conditionalformatting.DataBarCondition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.gembox.spreadsheet.internal.styles.CellFormatDataFormatHolder

    public final class DataBarCondition
extends FormatCondition
    Represents a condition that formats all cells based on their values by displaying a data bar whose length is proportional to cell's value.
    See Also:
    Excel Conditional Formatting example

      • isShowBarOnly

        public boolean isShowBarOnly()

        Gets a value indicating whether to show bar only.

        Default value is false (cell value is shown together with bar).

        Returns:
        true to show bar only; otherwise, false.

      • setShowBarOnly

        public void setShowBarOnly(boolean showBarOnly)

        Sets a value indicating whether to show bar only.

        Default value is false (cell value is shown together with bar).

        Parameters:
        showBarOnly - true to show bar only; otherwise, false.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Returns a String that represents this DataBarCondition instance.

        This method should be used primarily for debugging purposes and should be considered volatile (format of its return value might change in future versions).
